description: T1 Holm Oak - Reduce crown back to the vicinity of the previous reduction points approximately 1.5-2m. Thin over crowded areas and remove major dead wood. 	G1 Limes x7	- Reduce row of trees by up to 3m but only back to the vicinity of previous reduction points and try to keep leaf coverage as much as possible to keep some screen. Remove low down epicormic growth to minimise encroachment towards the house and path.T2 Sycamore stem - Remove one stem with significant dead sections.T3 Dead tree - Fell to ground level and remove all arisings.T4 Maple - Reduce crown by 2/3m approximately 30% of the crown and remove dead sections.	T5 Holly - Reduce in height by 2m and dome over.	T6 Macrocarpa - Carefully dismantle entire tree to near ground level using the latest lowering and rigging techniques to avoid damage to surrounding features.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
